mapper.sql: iid, pid, pTypeid, pStatus, comid, uid, starttime, endtime, remark

iid,
pid,
pTypeid,
pStatus,
comid,
uid,
starttime,
endtime,
remark,

mapper.update:
update item
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pTypeid = #{ptypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pStatus = #{pstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where comid = #{comid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update item set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pTypeid = #{ptypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pStatus = #{pstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comid = #{comid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where iid = #{iid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
